Important Information and Our Sponsors and Supporters

By now anyone who has entered the race online should have received their race numbers and information sheets. Anyone who hasn't please contact us by email or text/phone (see "Contact Us" page).

Contact Us
Photos
All Under 18's who wish to take part on the day will need to have the form signed by a parent or guadian.
So it is very important that you contact us with your details so we can get the application form to you prior to the race.
Please ensure that your race number is placed on the front of your T-shirt, in order for us to be able to read it when you cross the finish line.
We would also like to take this opportunity to thank Savvy Sport for their support.
